feed.title: Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening then periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 27 January 2023
